I have a few serious questions/comments concerning this post.

#1- isn't it=
 illegal to fire eight missles/ procectiles from 1 weapon?

#2- Cyanide is =
in a Stasis field so he wouldn't be able to scream anything.

#3 Theres alr=
eady 1 seemingly indestructable ship in the battle, is it legal to bring in=
 a second?

#4- The Trainer base has it's shields up so how could you telep=
ort anything through them?

#5- I thought Teleportation was outlawed becaus=
e of the abuse of power.

#6- can I intercept the extra missles to lower th=
e firepower down to legal standards?

I'll reply to the post when I get a r=
esponse.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: Legendarynemasis@... 
=
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Tuesday, June 05, 2001 12:27 PM
  Sub=
ject: Re: HAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA


  The violators shields quickly went down as=
 the scorpion tank with Skywarp was 
  launched off the trainer base. A doo=
r opened below the ship and the scorpion 
  tank quickly entered as did Gem=
ini 1 and two. Vile turns to Gemini 1 and 2 
  and growls. 

  Vile: "Cyani=
de may be caught but now these fools will all be destroyed! 
  Goodbye Cyan=
ide you haved risked yourself for us all." 

  And with that Vile opened a =
small compartment at his control console and 
  pressed it. Immeidately two=
 Mega photon torpedoes, six photon torpedoes, four 
  laser cannons, the fo=
ur multi phase laser cannons, and both mega cannons, 
  shooting 3 shots ea=
ch opened fire on the triaer base followed by a massive 
  blast fired at t=
he base from the Vile cannon. As this happened Vile shook his 
  head and b=
egan to walk away when the Violator was hammered by 8 massive 
  blasts cau=
sing the ship to shake violently and throw Vile and Methos from 
  where th=
ey were standing. Vile then got up and growls as Gemini 2 rushed to 
  his =
console and brought up a visual of a massive portal, with an infecticon 
  =
ship exiting it and hovering over the trainer base. 

  Vile: "Infecticons.=
.. prepare to open fire on that ship with everything we 
  have." 

  On th=
e Infecticon ship two black beings seemingly made of energy look at two 
  =
orbs in front of them, one displaying Predacon and X-Predacon energy 
  sig=
natures as well as some unknown types. One orb begins to glow as in the 
  =
center of the large dark control room a bright circle of light appears. As =

  this happens, a column of light shines striaght down and into the traine=
r 
  base(dont worry this isnt an attack) and engulfs cyanide,  who immedia=
tely 
  goes into a panick. 

  Cyanide: "No they're here! Help! Help!" 

 =
 As cyanide screams 8 rings appear around him before he himself turns into =
a 
  being of light. Soon he dissapears with the rings forming a sort of bu=
lge in 
  the column which quickly speeds up the beam of light and into the=
 Infecticon 
  ship...
